_Everything that defines how characters look and are built._

# Character Style Sheet

* Proportions (heroic, cartoon, realistic)
* Exaggeration rules (e.g., bigger hands/feet, expressive eyes)
* Material guidelines for clothes/props
* Color coding for classes or roles

# Character Turnarounds

* Front, side, back, Â¾ views
* Pose sheets
* Facial expression sheets

# Animation Guidelines

_(Optional but useful)_

* Movement style references
* Timing rules (snappy vs floaty)
* Anticipation/exaggeration style principles
* FX integration (motion trails, hit FX, squash & stretch)

# Technical Specs

* Polycount targets
* Texture budgets
* LOD strategy
* Rigging constraints
